description: A burst of refreshing fruit bring this lemonade to life.
keywords: Lemonade,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Passionfruit Lemonade Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 medium passionfruit, flesh and seeds only

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a saucepan with the water and sugar and cook until the sugar melts.
Once the sugar has melted, add the chopped lemons and passionfruit and allow to cook for 30 seconds and remove from the heat.
Allow to cool fully before mashing lightly with a potato masher and then using a sieve to transfer the liquid to a jug or suitable container for the fridge.
Place the lemonade base in the fridge to cool fully for 3 hours.
Remove the cooled lemonade base and serve with coconut water and ice if required.
